docs.lead_paragraph: WHILE Joseph B. Eastman, Director of the Office of Defense Transportation, says that he does not wish to discourage vacations this year, he does recommend that employers spread the holidays of their employes over several months and that the public avoid unnecessary traveling.

docs.snippet: LONDON, March 13 -- It was expected in unofficial quarters here today that the British Government's ban on travel between Britain and all parts of Ireland as a precaution against leakage of vital Allied military information would be followed by a ...
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, March 13 -- It was expected in unofficial quarters here today that the British Government's ban on travel between Britain and all parts of Ireland as a precaution against leakage of vital Allied military information would be followed by a similar restriction on travel between Ulster and Eire, where there are enemy agents as well as diplomatic and consular representatives.
